categories: Pocket knives and fixed blade knives
description: This protective Cordura® nylon sheath is large enough to accommodate most folding knives.Belt loop attaches the sheath to your belt for easy carrying.One size only, fits all Swiss Army knives except lockblades. Also fits the following lockblades: Victorinox® Cybertool, Victorinox Swiss Champ, and all versions of the Leatherman® Juice and Leatherman Squirt.
name: Victorinox Cordura Sheath
